name: Magnificent's Key Hero
description:
This game is a parody and a teaser to one of our main projects, known as Magnificent. It is specially made by one person in the team with original assets for a game jam submission: https://itch.io/jam/make-a-level Hosted by impeccable

It is so much fun to develop the game and we see so much potential in the game. Depending on the feedback and sentiments on the game, we might actually add more levels/story/depth/mechanics to the game and make it into a full game to be published for steam and consoles! (Only if people wants that)

Lastly, thank you for checking out Key Hero. Be sure to check out other games from our studio.  As a very new game studio, we need your support. Bye!

**Update**: As the Jam Host has extended a little bit of submission time, we've decided to upload a WebGL version of the game for more players to enjoy without having to download. This of course comes with a little performance sacrificing, for best enjoyment, please support us by downloading the game :)
